title: PlayStation's Nintendo Direct - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.22.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 15% off your first order at http://thirdlove.com/games

GameDaily.Biz's Amanda Farough joins Greg to talk about PlayStation's State of Play, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:51 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:06:29 - PlayStation Direct
00:07:51 - “Do you expect State of Play to be more like a Nintendo Direct or a Inside Xbox?” - Parker Petrov
00:14:14 - “Will there be a Kinda Funny Live Reactions just like one for the Google Stadia?” - Dapper Stephen
00:14:58 - Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 Reveal Event/Political Nature
00:21:03 - Best-Selling Nindies
00:23:00 - Quantic Dream coming to Epic Games Store
00:30:18 - Out today
00:35:24 -  Robinhood
00:36:30 -  Thirdlove
Reader mail   -
00:37:49 - “Sekiro has arrived and I am ready to die.” - Daniel Summers
00:47:54 - Squad Up: Jorge Navarrete - PC: BeyondtheGrave, Xbox: Thedarknight08
00:48:56 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg & Andrea
Tuesday: Greg & Ben Runnings
Wednesday: Tim & Whitta
Thursday: Tim & Fran
Friday: Fran & Imran Khan
